name: Solitaire Tripeaks Home
description:
Want to be a Tripeaks master? Want to be an expert in decorating? Play the solitaire card game, decorate your dream room in your spare time. This game is the perfect choice. Now start the Solitaire journey with us and design your dreamed room as you want.

Game features：

Ingenious gameplay design
- There are hundreds of levels for you to experience, and new levels will be updated regularly. The levels of each stage have different challenges, which will not let you get bored.
- Abundant levels can bring you different experiences, and there are many special cards to refresh you.
- Can you decorate the room? Yes, you can choose all kinds of furniture for your room and decorate your dream home according to your ideas.

Excellent graphics and music design
- Each card has been carefully designed, and the levels of different stages also have customized background music, giving you a refreshing feeling.

Unique decoration experience
- Different scenes are available for you to decorate, villas, kitchens, swimming pools...and will be updated regularly, each scene will make you fall in love with this game.
- There are many different choices for each kind of furniture, and different matching styles can make your decoration tasteful.
- While decorating, you can also improve your decorating skills, show us your dream room.

This is a game that integrates decoration and solitaire. It is a perfect choice for card and decoration lovers. Start your solitaire journey here!
